summary: Makes it so Fus Ro (Unrelenting Force lvl2) topples NPCs instead of just staggering them like with Fus, but doesn't send them flying like with Fus Ro Dah.
descriptionHtml:
Makes it so Fus Ro (Unrelenting Force lvl2) topples NPCs instead of just staggering them like with Fus, but doesn't send them flying like with Fus Ro Dah.

Long Description:
When I was first trying out the Unrelenting Force shout, I was no less surprised to see that there was little difference between Fus (Unrelenting Force lvl1) and Fus Ro (Unrelenting Force lvl2), and that there was a big gap of power between Fus Ro and Fus Ro Dah (Unrelenting Force lvl3). So I made this, which makes it so instead of just simply staggering NPCs like Fus would (plus 5 damage, which felt like basically the only difference between Fus and Fus Ro), it makes them fall over instead like with what Fus Ro Dah does. The only difference here is that the force applied to Fus Ro is only mild, so there's little movement or displacement with the shout, whereas, Fus Ro Dah would send NPCs flying.

There are two versions here
*FusRoKnocksDownEnemies.esp: normal, self-explanatory version
*FusRoKnocksDownEnemies - Longer Recovery Time.esp: The recovery time for Fus Ro is changed from 20 to 35, as an addition to make it realistic and compliant with it's new power, according to Bethesda's own style of balance.

This mod will only conflict with other mods that alter the effect of the Fus Ro shout, meaning this would go great with any mod that increases the force applied to the Fus Ro Dah shout.

Also on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21649]Steam Workshop[/url].

Please note that if you have any comments or concerns, [size=4][b]you should notify me through the Workshop link above[/b][/size], since I rarely check the Nexus and probably will not respond if you do otherwise.

*Updated* the Draugr version of the shout no longer has the same effect, so hopefully, you won't be pushed around as much anymore.
author: seventonblade
